formInfo.title: UNDERTAKING TO BE EXECUTED BY Ph.D. SCHOLARS FOR AWARD OF SCHOLARSHIP

undertakingPoints: I am not selected for any regular appointment/service and I am registering for the Ph.D. programme with the intention of completing it.
I am not and will not be in receipt of any salary or other financial benefits from any source, except the MHRD/Institute Scholarship during the period of my study at the Institute.
I will obtain prior permission from the institute before appearing in any examination conducted by other Institutions/Universities/Public bodies.
I will not apply for or accept any job without obtaining prior permission from the Institute.
I will undertake to dedicate 8 hours per week to teaching-related activities within the department or to academic research projects as assigned by the Head of the Department.

I understand that the continuation of the scholarship for each semester is contingent on my satisfactory performance in teaching/research assignments and my satisfactory academic performance and progress.
I also understand that the scholarship will be terminated at any time if my performance in the assigned duties or the progress in my research work is judged to be unsatisfactory.
I am eligible for regular leave of 30 days for each academic year. The scholarship will not be paid for any leave availed in excess of 30 days.
I agree to abide by all the existing rules and conditions governing the award of the Institute Scholarship, including any modifications made from time to time.
I am fully aware of and agree to follow the rules and regulations governing the Ph.D. programme at NIT Agartala.
I will not apply for a patent for an invention based on the research work without the written permission of the Director of NIT Agartala.
I have already deposited the first installment of fees and commenced attending the programme.
